resources.string: FridgeTracker is a simple yet smart app for managing food in your fridge or freezer. It helps you track expiration dates, create shopping lists, organize your storage, and keep an overview of what you have at home.
I plan to add new features to improve the app experience:
• Barcode scanning connected to a database
• Option to take a custom icon photo
Currently, I’m working on letting users take a photo of their own food and use it as an icon.
